attributes.action: Demand the resignation of House of Commons speaker Michael Martin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin should never have allowed the police to search the private office of Conservative immigration spokesman Damian Green. He is not acting up to the honourable traditions of his office and is instead acting as an agent of the developing police state. On this basis we believe the Prime Minister should immediately demand the Speakers resignation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
